projects.name: ChessCord
projects.summary: Play chess with your friends on Discord
projects.description: This is a Discord Bot I single-handedly coded that allows you to play multiplayer chess games, all within a popular chatting platform. It includes support for almost all features available on professional chess sites, including spectating, takebacks, rating tracking, and much more! Best of all, this is condensed into an amazing look and easy experience.

projects.name: Find A Tutor
projects.description: Offer to tutor and find other tutors to learn easily, quickly, and more in-depth.

projects.name: Activity Marathon
projects.description: Due to Covid-19, average physical activity has reached an all-time low. Hopefully this website will help make working out more fun and engaging by allowing users to compete for rewards.

projects.name: My Website
projects.summary: What you're looking at right now
projects.description: A personal website built using Svelte, SvelteKit, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

projects.name: Self-Playing Guitar
projects.description: Scripts and a web UI to automatically play the guitar using a Raspberry Pi and a whole bunch of solenoids.

projects.name: Better StudentVUE
projects.summary: Everything you want to see when checking your grades
projects.description: Better StudentVUE calculates helpful numbers for you based on your grade report, allowing you to easily predict and plan for the future.

projects.name: Discord Event Manager
projects.summary: Manage your Discord events with ease
projects.description: A Discord bot that makes it easy to manage and schedule events, including recurring events and ones synced to cloud calendars.

projects.name: YouTube Downloader
projects.description: A simple way to download YouTube videos as audio files with metadata.

projects.name: Mine Sweeper
projects.description: A simple implementation of the classic game Minesweeper.

projects.name: PacMan
projects.description: A simple implementation of the classic game PacMan.

projects.name: Sudoku Solver
projects.description: A simple implementation of a Sudoku solver using the backtracking algorithm.

projects.name: Space Invaders
projects.description: A simple implementation of the classic game Space Invaders.

projects.name: Cricket World Cup
projects.description: A simple implementation of a cricket game where you can play against your friends.

projects.name: Sniper Game
projects.description: A simple implementation of a first-person shooter game.

projects.name: Jeopardy!
projects.description: Play Jeopardy! with your friends.

projects.name: Image To ASCII
projects.description: Convert images to ASCII art.

projects.name: HomeServer
projects.description: Uses a Raspberry Pi Camera and the picamera module to stream video feed to a webserver.

projects.name: Hangman
projects.description: A simple implementation of the classic game Hangman.

projects.name: Flappy Bird
projects.description: A simple implementation of the classic game Flappy Bird.

projects.name: Flappy Bird AI
projects.summary: Watch the AI learn to play
projects.description: A NEAT (Neuro-Evolution of Augmenting Topologies) AI algorithm to master Flappy Bird.

projects.name: Basic Platformer
projects.summary: A starting point for platformer games
projects.description: A simple platformer game to serve as a starting point for more complex games.

projects.name: Trie
projects.summary: An implementation of my favorite data structure
projects.description: A simple implementation of a trie data structure (not to be confused with a tree).

projects.name: Chat App
projects.description: A simple chat application using websockets.

projects.name: SOBot
projects.description: A Discord bot that allows you to practice Science Olympiad events.

projects.name: Text Input
projects.description: A simple textbox for Pygame.

projects.name: GitCord
projects.summary: Quickly reference GitHub repos in Discord
projects.description: Use /r to quickly reference repositories, issues, and pull requests across GitHub and GitLab.
